existing_features.title: Create a responsive shoes company website with the following pages and navigation: Home, Shop (product listing), Product Details, About, and Contact.

Define and apply a coherent visual theme for the entire website (colors, typography, spacing, components) with a modern premium footwear brand feel using warm neutrals (e.g., cream/sand), charcoal/black, and a single accent color (e.g., terracotta). Avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.
Implement a Shop page that displays a grid of shoes with search and filtering (at minimum: category and price range) and sorting (at minimum: price low-to-high and high-to-low).
Implement a Product Details page that shows product images, name, price, description, available sizes, and a clear call-to-action button (e.g., “Add to Cart” or “Inquire”).
Create a Contact page with a form (name, email, message) that submits to the backend and stores submissions in stable state; show a success and error state in the UI.
Create an About page with brand story sections (e.g., Craft, Materials, Sustainability) and a simple timeline or values list suitable for a premium shoe company.
Use React Query for frontend data fetching/caching for the product catalog and contact submission; ensure loading and empty states are handled for Shop and Product Details.
Add a footer with key links (Shop, About, Contact), basic company info, and social link placeholders (no external API integration required).
Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (logo, hero, and product images). Do not serve generated images from the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add backend support for a public product catalog: store products in stable state in the single Motoko main actor and expose query methods to list products and fetch a product by ID (including fields needed for Shop filters/sort and Product Details). Seed the catalog with a small set of sample shoe products.
